text: Aur munafiq kaun. Woh munafiq ke jab unsey kaha gaya, aao Allah ki raah mein jung karo ya kam az kam (apne shehar ki) mudafiyat (defense) hi karo, to kehne lagey agar humein ilm hota ke aaj jung hogi to hum zaroor tumhare saath chalte. Yeh baat jab woh keh rahey thay us waqt woh iman ki ba-nisbat kufr se zyada qareeb thay. Woh apni zubaano se woh baatein kehte hain jo unke dilon mein nahin hoti, aur jo kuch woh dilon mein chupate hain Allah usey khoob jaanta hai
